info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Eddy, Lea and northwestern Gaines Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1044 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Maljamar, or 28 miles west of Lovington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Lovington, Tatum, Monument, Humble City, Avalon, Maljamar, Crossroads, Caprock, McDonald, Carlsbad North, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, Loco Hills, Gladiola, Tatum Airport, Knowles, Halfway, Lea County Regional Airport, Lake Avalon and Industrial Airpark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
